{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"content":[{"data":{},"marks":[],"value":"We are pleased to announce that board applications for the Fall 2022 semester are now open!

Our team consists of passionate individuals who are devoted to making CSA a welcoming community for everyone to enjoy, partake in, and learn about Chinese culture. We highly encourage anyone who is interested to apply.

Applications opened on August 20, 2022 and will close on September 5, 2022. Find more information below!
